Name: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' occurrences across all cases
Metric: Number of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' activities

Name: Percentage of process variants that include 'Accepted + Wait - Customer'
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' being directly followed by 'Completed + Resolved'
Metric: Number of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' activities for cases where activity 'Completed + Resolved' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' that occur after 'Queued + Awaiting Assignment'
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' out of all 'Queued + Awaiting Assignment'

Name: Frequency of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' appearing in variants with total performance duration above the median
Metric: Number of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' activities

Name: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' relative to the frequency of 'Accepted + Wait - User'
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' out of all 'Accepted + Wait - User'

Name: Frequency of cases where 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' appears more than once
Metric: the sum of the function base > 1 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Accepted + Wait - Customer'

Name: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' that are eventually followed by 'Completed + Closed'
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' out of all 'Completed + Closed'

Name: Frequency of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' in comparison to 'Accepted + Wait - Vendor' and 'Accepted + Wait - Implementation'
Metric: Number of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' activities for cases where activity 'Accepted + Wait - Vendor' occurs

Name: Percentage of variants containing 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' that also contain 'Completed + In Call'
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' out of all 'Completed + In Call'

Name: Frequency of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' occurring before any occurrence of 'Completed + In Call' in the same case
Metric: Number of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' activities for cases where activity 'Completed + In Call' occurs

Name: Percentage of all 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' events that appear in cases which never execute 'Completed + In Call'
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' out of all cases where 'Completed + In Call' does not happen

Name: Frequency of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' grouped by country of execution
Metric: Number of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' activities grouped by the last value of organization country

Name: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' events that occur in the longest 10% of process variants (by performance duration)
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of transitions from 'Accepted + In Progress' directly to 'Accepted + Wait - Customer'
Metric: Number of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' activities for cases where activity 'Accepted + In Progress' occurs

Name: Percentage of cases starting with 'Queued + Awaiting Assignment' that later include 'Accepted + Wait - Customer'
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' out of all 'Queued + Awaiting Assignment'

Name: Frequency of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' in cases that also include at least one instance of 'Completed + In Call'
Metric: Number of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' activities for cases where activity 'Completed + In Call' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' relative to the total number of 'Accepted + Wait' type activities
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' out of all 'Accepted + Wait'

Name: Frequency of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' per year, derived from time:timestamp
Metric: Number of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' activities
